long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Monster Klase
=============

![screenshot](http://f.nn.lv/my/ep/ei/screenshot.png)

 this is a Chrome extension that makes some pages less annoying to use.
 app name is taken from really original banner name.

Application is in Alfa testing phase, use only for tests

Features
========

* removes news and other useless clutter from some web page main pages, leaving only the navigation bar and the login form

* stops the login form from opening a new window

* makes the main page look OK on (almost) any screen size

Legal
========

Monster Klase only changes visual appearance in some pages - makes web browsing cleaner and faster and therefore fully complies with Google Terms and local laws.
Visual changes are local and are made in user browser.

Other
========
This application can be taken offline if original app creator asks for it.
